name: Cognitive Ability Test
description: Measures verbal, numerical, and logical reasoning abilities crucial for problem-solving and decision-making in various roles.

name: Occupational Personality Questionnaire (OPQ)
description: Evaluates behavioral style and personality traits to predict job performance and cultural fit within organizations.

name: Sales Assessment
description: Designed to assess sales potential through a combination of cognitive, personality, and situational judgment measures.

name: Leadership Potential Assessment
description: Assesses leadership qualities, decision-making skills, and the ability to influence others, suitable for managerial roles.

name: Behavioral Interview Simulation
description: Simulates real-life interview scenarios to evaluate behavioral competencies and responses under pressure.
